body.name: Molly's Suds Dishwasher Pods | Natural Dishwasher Detergent, Cuts Grease & Rinses Clean (Residue-Free) for Sparkling Dishes | 60 Auto-Release Tabs (Citrus)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 28 mins
features: SPARKLING CLEAN WITHOUT HARSH CHEMICALS: Molly’s Suds Dishwasher Detergent Pods naturally cut through grease & stuck-on food stains to leave dishes sparking with zero residue, streaks, or other mineral build-up. Simple and effective, Molly’s Suds products are free from ethoxylates and certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny.

CONVENIENT & EASY TO USE: A single auto-release pod works to clean 1 full load of dishes. Safe for use on glassware, porcelain, stainless steel, pots & pans, baby bottles and more! Simply rinse dishes with hot water prior to loading in your dishwasher (works with built-in, portable & drawer styles), add pod, select your preferred wash cycle and let Molly’s Suds do the hard work!

EARTH-DERIVED FORMULA: Formulated with plant-powered active cleaning ingredients that really work. Created for those with skin sensitivities and allergies in mind. Cleaner dishes, cleaner environment!

POWERFUL YET GENTLE: Low sudsing formula contains active enzymes to dissolve food, grease & grime without the need for harsh chemicals or any rinse aids. Fragrance free, hypoallergenic. Works well on all stain types including dried-on food, coffee & tea stains, even red wine spots! Effective with both hard and soft water.
WHAT’S INCLUDED: One 60 count bag of Dishwasher Detergent Pods. Free of harsh synthetic fragrances, dyes, and other harmful chemicals such as ethoxylates.

Are Molly's Suds products safe for sensitive skin? Yes! Many of our customers have sensitive skin or eczema and that is why they use all of our products. There are no harsh or leaching chemicals and each product is clean rinsing. Are your Dishwasher Pods HE-Friendly? Yes! Our Dishwasher Pods are safe for standard, HE, and commercial dishwashers. Are your Dishwasher Pods septic-safe? All of our laundry and cleaning products are septic-safe. Are Molly's Suds products safe to use while pregnant and/or for my baby's bottles? All of our products are safe to use during pregnancy. Many parents choose our unscented products for newborns, however our scented options are safe to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These dishwasher pods are awesome and worth the money! I purchased these because I was tired of “tasting” the scent from my previous dishwasher detergent (Cascade Platinum Plus). I started using these, and my dishes are now clean and scent free! I recommend doing a pre-scrub / pre-rinse on your dishes beforehand though. These dishwasher pods are not a miracle product! They sure do the job though!Note: I have hard water and they still work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really wanted them to work
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to switch to something less harmful to me and the environment, but there's no beating cascade. Please note I have an old crappy dishwasher and hard city water. I live in an apartment with no water softener. This product does a great job at cleaning plates and cups that do not have anything tough on them like coffee rings or dried food, but if you have tough stains or let things sit in the dishwasher this will not remove the grime. I even tried 2 pods with added citric acid. Even after three washes the same cup was still stained and dirty. If you methodically rinse all your dishes, don't have stained cups, just use your dishwasher for sanitation after washing dishes yourself, or have a newer dishwasher with soft water these may work great for you. But for most people without those things you're going to have to either scrub before you put into the dishwasher or after.If you wipe and clean everything off your plates and don't let coffee cups sit around and run your dishwasher daily before stains set this is your product. If not though don't expect this to work magic like a cascade platinum pod.I am still giving 5 stars because this is a great product. I love the scent and that it doesn't contain harmful ingredients. I'm impressed the scent is only essential oils! Exactly what I wanted. Once I get soft water and have to run my dishwasher more frequently I think these will be perfect. Currently though I'm lazy and throw things in the dishwasher haphazardly and only run it every 3-5 days.For improvement I would say they need to add something to assist stain removal for cups and add more water softening agents. Maybe even a hard and soft water version. If it would remove hardened food and coffee cups stains I'd switch to this in a heartbeat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These smell amazing and are such a wonderful non toxic goodie!!! These are my favorite by far of any other brands! The smell is wonderful and my dishwasher has no problem with them! Definitely will purchase a million times!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Molly’s SUDS gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. If you are looking for a non-toxic alternative, give Molly’s suds a try. It’s simple, safe and effective. One of my favorites brands! It will definitely get your dishes clean. We choose to use the unscented, but they do have other options to choose from. Great value in price for a cleaner alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural dish detergent that works
reviews.reviewText: I’m a big fan of Molly Suds. These dish detergent packets work well and the fact that the ingredients are natural is an added plus! Great citrus smell and clean dishes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent and better than alternatives!
reviews.reviewText: We try to use as many products as we can that are safer than the mainstream options available. When it came to dishwasher tablets this became a real chore! Most don't clean the dishes very well and leave residue on the glasses. We were pleasantly surprised to find these did the job and they smell great also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good clean, but strong smell
reviews.reviewText: I like that these get the job done, but the smell is a bit strong for my liking. We love all the other Molly’s Suds products we use, but these are not my favorite. I don’t dislike them enough to stop using them, and they are effective. But I won’t buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One pod per wash is all you need! throw it in, close the door and wash. I don't have any stuck on food or excessive water spots. This line is clean and non toxic. I use multiple items from their line and haven't been disappointed yet.
